channel.title: [Solved]Stupid ass Error
channel.description:
This is the error i am getting [code]bad.client.java:12: class client is public, should be declared in a file named c lient.java public class client extends Player implements Runnable { ^ bad.NPCHandler.java:4: class NPCHandler is public, should be declared in a file named NPCHandler.java public class NPCHandler { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Wtf is this about i cant even think of a way to fix that shit.....
IDK why but it just disappeared.... o duh i am retarted i know why it did that.....
